Desc: The wind's too strong at the venue. The referee got blown away! We're doing our best to track them down, so please stay tuned!
The track runs through a meteor field,making it a bumpy ride. Racers have turned it into a bumper car match. Hlope they're having fun!
An intergalactic delivery worker accidentally took apart the finish line. We've retrieved the pieces and are working tfix it!
Emergency notice! The race system has been hacked, and now all the referees have turned into Kuroro!
One of the racers is popping champagne at halftime! A quick reminder: Please drive safely, and absolutely no drinking while racing.
Oh no! A group of mechanical penguins has taken over the podium. They insist they're the real winners of this race!
Attention, everyone! Please do not remotely feed the contestants. Some racers couldn't resist the food and went off course.
Bad news, a section of the track got caught in a black hole's gravity. The staff are doing emergency repairs right now.
